dict.string: A bandana with the power to reveal previously undetectable hidden paths through rooms.
A new sword grip which enables a cleaner swing occasionally resulting in a critical hit.
An enchanted amulet which grants the wearer the ability to transform in to a canine form of themself using the X button.
Spikes worn on the wrists which can be embedded in certain surfaces to enable climbing to previously unreachable areas.
A relic that enables the user to harness residual energy to invoke a second jump while rising or falling.
